ingredients.ingredient: 1 (1 ounce) square semisweet baking chocolate, chopped

cookingTips: Microwave in 30-second intervals, stirring between each, to prevent overheating and seized chocolate
Line the pan with parchment paper for easy removal and cutting
Cut into squares while still slightly warm for clean edges
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Walk me through making quick microwave fudge with condensed milk and chocolate chips
